```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(mgcv)
data(meuse, package="sp")

# Inspect the data
head(meuse)
str(meuse)
```
```{r}
mod2d <- gam(
  data = meuse,
  cadmium ~ s(x,y),
  method = "REML"
)
```
inspect the model
```{r}
summary(mod2d)
```
```{r}
coef(mod2d)
```
```{r}
mod2da <- gam(
  data = meuse,
  cadmium ~ s(x,y) + s(elev) +s(dist),
  method = "REML"
)
```
```{r}
summary(mod2da)
coef(mod2da)
```
```{r}
plot(mod2d)
```

```{r}
plot(mod2da)
```
```{r}
plot(mod2d, scheme = 1)
```

```{r}
plot(mod2d, scheme = 2)
```
```{r}
vis.gam(mod2d, view = c("x","y"), plot.type = "persp")
```

```{r}
# Make plot with 5% extrapolation

points(meuse)
```
```{r}

points(meuse)
```

```{r}
mod_sep <- gam(data = meuse,
               copper ~ s(dist, by = landuse) + landuse,
               method = "REML"
               )
summary(mod_sep)
```
```{r}
mod_fs <- gam(
  data = meuse,
  method = "REML",
  copper ~ s(dist, landuse, bs = "fs")
)

summary(mod_fs)
```
```{r}
plot(mod_sep, pages = 1)
```

```{r}
plot(mod_fs, pages = 1)
```

```{r}
vis.gam(mod_sep, view = c("dist", "landuse"), plot.type = "persp")
```
```{r}
vis.gam(mod_fs, view = c("dist", "landuse"), plot.type = "persp")
```
